titles.title: Cecil the Lion Endangered and Threatened Species Act of 2015

To amend the Endangered Species Act of 1973 to prohibit the taking of any endangered species or threatened species of fish or wildlife in the United States as a trophy and the importation of any such trophy into the United States, and for other purposes.
Cecil the Lion Endangered and Threatened Species Act of 2015

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
Cecil the Lion Endangered and Threatened Species Act of 2015
This bill amends the Endangered Species Act of 1973 to prohibit: (1) taking endangered or threatened species within the United States or U.S. territorial seas as trophies, or (2) importing such trophies.
Any person seeking to import a fish or wildlife trophy must submit documentation establishing that the trophy was taken before the enactment of this bill.
